Level1;Line1: If one of the enemes (The red ball) gets passed you, you lose a live.
Level1;Line2: You have 3 lives. To not lose a live you must use arrow keys to get underneath the enemies
Level1;Line3: The timer at the top left of your screen will tell you how much time you have left.
Level1;Line4: In this level you have to survive 50 seconds. Have fun! :)
